Entry.HWD: 02/2/2/Present Simple with he, she and it

GapFillDragDrop.Title: Present Simple with he, she and it
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on a word and drag it to the correct gap.
GapFillDragDrop.ContentGapFillDragDrop:
A: DoesLucinda Brown work here?
B: No, she doesn't. She worksin our other shop, in Main Street.
A: Oh, what time does she havelunch?
B: I think she haslunch at one.
A: OK. Doyou have the phone number of the shop?
B: No, I don't. But it's on the shop card - over there.
A: Thanks. Does the bus gofrom here to Main Street?
B: Yes, it does. You getthe bus next to the hotel.
